remarks.format: ## Remarks 新聞訂閱物件模型允許您新增自訂屬性至 執行個體。The Syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a instance. 當為 Atom 1.0 序列化時，會將自訂屬性寫入 `` 項目。When serialized for Atom 1.0, the custom attribute is written to an `` element. 當為 RSS 2.0 序列化時，會將自訂屬性寫入 `` 項目。When serialized for RSS 2.0, the custom attribute is written to an `` element. 如需示範如何加入屬性延伸的完整範例，請參閱 < [Loosely-Typed 延伸](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)範例。For a complete example that shows how to add an attribute extension, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將屬性延伸加入至新聞訂閱摘要。The following code shows how to add an attribute extension to a syndication feed. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/snippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/snippets.vb#3)] 下列 XML 程式碼會示範包含稱為 的自訂屬性之 `itemAttrib` 執行個體的 Atom 1.0 序列化。The following XML code shows an Atom 1.0 serialization of a instance with a custom attribute called `itemAttrib`. [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#4](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/atom.xml#4)] 下列程式碼顯示序列化為 RSS 2.0 的相同 執行個體。The following code shows the same instance serialized as RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#5](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/rss.xml#5)]

summary.span: Gets and sets the content of the syndication item.

value.span: 包含新聞訂閱項目內容的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance that contains the content of the syndication item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為所有新聞訂閱內容型別的基底類別。 is a base class for all syndication content types. [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] 會定義下列新聞訂閱內容類型：The [!INCLUDE[netfx35_short](~/includes/netfx35-short-md.md)] defines the following syndication content types: - - - 您可將此屬性指派至任何內容型別 (或是衍生自 使用者定義型別)。You can assign this property to any of these content types (or possibly a user-defined type derived from ). 如果是 Atom 1.0， 屬性會序列化至 `` 項目。For Atom 1.0, the property is serialized to a `` element. 如果是 RSS 2.0， 屬性會序列化至 `` 的 項目，`` 和 的 項目。For RSS 2.0, the property is serialized to a `` element for , a `` element for and . ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將內容加入至 。The following code shows how to add content to a . [!code-csharp[SyndicationItem#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/cs/program.cs#24)] [!code-vb[SyndicationItem#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/vb/snippets.vb#24)] 下列 XML 會說明如何將 屬性序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized for Atom 1.0. 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some content ``` 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some text ``` 下列 XML 會說明如何針對 RSS 2.0 序列化 屬性。The following XML shows how the property is serialized for RSS 2.0. 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some content ``` 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 序列化的方式如下列範例所示。 is serialized as shown in the following example. ``` This is some text ```

summary.span: Gets the element extensions contained in the syndication item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設命名空間與封入命名空間不同，即可將任何有效的 XML 項目延伸加以新增。Any valid XML element can be added as an extension provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 序列化時，延伸會如其他任何 XML 項目一般寫入。When serialized, extensions are written like any other XML element. ``` ``` 如需示範如何新增項目延伸的完整範例，請參閱 < [Loosely-Typed 延伸](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)範例。For a complete example that shows how to add element extensions, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將項目延伸加入至 執行個體。The following code shows how to add element extensions to a instance. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter GetRss20Formatter(bool serializeExtensionsAsAtom) cil managed
Public Function GetRss20Formatter (serializeExtensionsAsAtom As Boolean) As Rss20ItemFormatter

param.name: serializeExtensionsAsAtom
param.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize element and attribute extensions with an Atom 1.0 namespace.

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize element and attribute extensions with an Atom 1.0 namespace.

summary.span: Gets an instance.

span.span: Gets an instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非項目及屬性在命名空間之內，否則 RSS 2.0 只允許規格中的項目與屬性。RSS 2.0 allows elements and attributes that are not in its specification only if they are within a namespace. 當 `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` 參數為 `true`時，格式器自動新增 "a10" 命名空間限定詞至所有延伸；否則延伸不序列化。When the `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, the formatter automatically adds the "a10" namespace to all extensions; otherwise, the extensions are not serialized. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將 RSS 2.0 格式的新聞訂閱項目寫入至 XML 檔案，並序列化屬性和項目延伸。The following code shows how to write a syndication item in RSS 2.0 format to an XML file, serializing attribute and element extensions. [!code-csharp[SyndicationItem#44](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/cs/program.cs#44)] [!code-vb[SyndicationItem#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/vb/snippets.vb#44)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 時，會將此屬性寫入 `` 項目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44ed0-311">When serialized to Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0, this property is written to a `<title>` element.</span></span> ## Examples <span data-ttu-id="44ed0-312">下列程式碼會示範如何設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> 執行個體的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 屬性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44ed0-312">The following code shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> property on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance.</span></span> [!code-csharp[SyndicationItem#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/cs/program.cs#32)] [!code-vb[SyndicationItem#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/vb/snippets.vb#32)] <span data-ttu-id="44ed0-313">下列 XML 會示範 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> 屬性如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44ed0-313">The following XML shows how the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> property is serialized to Atom 1.0.</span></span> [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#18](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/atom.xml#18)] <span data-ttu-id="44ed0-314">下列 XML 程式碼會示範 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> 屬性序列化為 RSS 2.0 的方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="44ed0-314">The following XML code shows how the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.Title%2A> property is serialized to RSS 2.0.</span></span> [!code-xml[SyndicationItem#19](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationitem/common/rss.xml#19)]

param.span: The name of the element.

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 它們會序列化為 `` 的屬性 (如果是 Atom 1.0) 或 `` (如果是 RSS 1.0) 項目，視使用的新聞訂閱版本而定。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` (for Atom 1.0) or `` (for RSS 1.0) element, depending upon the syndication version being used. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.
